entries.text: Thank you for calling our customer service. If you know your tracking number, please say it now.
I don't have my tracking number, but I need to know the status of my order!
Please hold while I connect you to a representative.
Hello! This is Sarah from customer service. How can I assist you today?
Hi Sarah. I'm calling to get a shipping update on my order. It's already late and I haven’t received any information.
I’m sorry to hear that! Can you provide me with your order number so I can check the package location for you?
I don’t have my order number either! I just want to know when it will arrive!
I understand your frustration. Without the order number, it's a bit challenging, but let me see what I can do. Have you received any tracking number emails?
No! I didn’t get anything! I really just want to know the scheduled delivery date!
I empathize with you. Unfortunately, without a tracking number or order number, I can't provide a specific scheduled delivery date. Can you recall any details about the order?
I told you, all I want is to know where my package is! This is ridiculous!
I’m truly sorry for the inconvenience. If you have any details like the product name or your email associated with the order, I can try to pull up something.
No, this isn't working! I'm so frustrated right now. What kind of service is this?
I understand how important this is for you, and I'm doing my best to help. I wish I could give you more information.
You’re not helping me at all! I waited so long for this call and you have nothing!
I apologize for the delay and the inconvenience. I genuinely want to assist, but I need some more information to move forward.
Ugh, this is pointless! I’m hanging up!
I’m really sorry to hear that. Please know we are here to help. Have a great day!
